description: An Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability exists in the embedded web servers in all Modicon M340, Premium, Quantum PLCs and BMXNOR0200 allowing an attacker to send a specially crafted URL to a currently authenticated web server user to execute a password change on the web server.

product.name: Embedded Web Servers in all Modicon M340, Premium, Quantum PLCs and BMXNOR0200

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Embedded Web Servers in all Modicon M340, Premium, Quantum PLCs and BMXNOR0200
